page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN EXMOUTH.
page.content: Unemployed people can visit the { {JOB CENTRE }to see what jobs are available in their area. People also find jobs advertised in news papers . On May 9th in Exmouth there were { {1564}people unemployed made up of {986 }men and {578}women ,out of a population of {29000. Unemployment in Exmouth is an increasing problem,but a lot of people think that some of the unemployed people would get jobs if they tried { harder. There are more jobs available in the{Summer}because of{tourists. } The{Y.T.S.}or Youth Training Scheme is to help school leavers to know what jobs they want to do. Many people have got jobs through this scheme, and it gives many others the opportunity to gain work experience.
